sqlMap.select: select $seqId$.NEXTVAL from dual
$value$
SELECT R.PK_ROLE_ID AS code, R.ROLE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_ROLE R WHERE R.STATUS = '1' AND ROLE_TYPE = '1' ORDER BY SORT
SELECT R.PK_ROLE_ID AS code, R.ROLE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_ROLE R WHERE R.STATUS = '1' AND ROLE_TYPE = #value# ORDER BY SORT
SELECT PDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, PDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT PDD WHERE PDD.CODE_TYPE = 'ROLE_TYPE' ORDER BY SORT_NO
SELECT PDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, PDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT PDD WHERE PDD.CODE_TYPE = 'DEPARTMENT_CODE' ORDER BY SORT_NO

select sigh.head_id as code, sigh.group_code || '-' || sigh.group_name as name from MM_JISO_GROUP_HEAD sigh where sigh.del_flg = '0' and sysdate between sigh.indt and sigh.exdt AND sigh.ARR_FACTORY = #value# order by sigh.head_id

select distinct sigs.group_supplier_id as code, sigs.supplier_id || '-' || nvl(sigs.factory_id, sigs.supplier_id) as name, sigs.head_id from MM_JISO_GROUP_SUPPLIER sigs where sigs.del_flg = '0' and sysdate between sigs.indt and sigs.exdt
sigs.head_id = #value#
order by sigs.supplier_id, sigs.factory_id
SELECT PF.FACTORY_CODE AS code, PF.FACTORY_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_FACTORY PF
SELECT PDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, PDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT PDD WHERE PDD.CODE_TYPE = 'EFF_STATE' ORDER BY SORT_NO
SELECT PF.FACTORY_CODE AS code, PF.FACTORY_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_FACTORY PF WHERE PF.FACTORY_CODE = #value#
SELECT WAREHOUSE_ID AS code, WAREHOUSE_NAME AS name FROM MM_MP_WAREHOUSE WHERE WAREHOUSE_ADDRESS=#value# ORDER BY WAREHOUSE_ID
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE ='JIT_LOC_FUNCAREA' ORDER BY SORT_NO
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE ='JIT_KB_CODE' ORDER BY SORT_NO
SELECT GROUP_ID AS code, GROUP_NAME AS name FROM MM_SW_SUPPLIER_GROUP
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'WORKCENTER' ORDER BY SORT_NO
SELECT MP.center_id AS code, MP.center_name AS name FROM MM_MP_CENTER MP WHERE MP.DEL_FLG = '0' and mp.ADDRESS_CODE=#factory#
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'JIS_FLAG'
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'IS_SENDTOERP'
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'IS_AUTO_PRINT'
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'MM_PRINTER'
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'REC_MES_STATE' ORDER BY SORT_NO
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'REC_ERP_STATE' ORDER BY SORT_NO
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'JIT_PLAN_CODE' ORDER BY SORT_NO
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'JIT_ORDER_DIFF' ORDER BY SORT_NO
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'PUB_PRINTER_GROUP' ORDER BY SORT_NO
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'PUB_BILL_TYPE' ORDER BY SORT_NO
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'MM_JIT_ORDER_STATE' ORDER BY SORT_NO
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'PRINT_STATUS' ORDER BY SORT_NO
SELECT MJP.PARTGROUP_NO AS code, MJP.PARTGROUP_NAME AS name FROM MM_JISI_PARTGROUP MJP

SELECT '' AS code,'' AS name FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT T.SHIP_DEPOT AS code, DC.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_JIT_PART T INNER JOIN MM_PUB_DATA_DICT DC ON T.SHIP_DEPOT=DC.CODE_VALUE AND DC.CODE_TYPE = 'JIT_SHIP_DEPOT' WHERE T.PLAN_CODE = #value# ORDER BY code DESC
SELECT MJP.PARTGROUP_NO AS code, MJP.PARTGROUP_NAME AS name FROM MM_JISI_PARTGROUP MJP WHERE MJP.FACTORY = #value#
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'VEH_ORDER_STATUS'
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'PRO_PHASE'
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'JIT_SHIP_DEPOT'
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'JIT_SHIP_DEPOT_TYPE'
SELECT a.supplier_no AS code,a.supplier_no AS name,'' aogFactory FROM mm_supplier a WHERE a.supplier_no LIKE UPPER(#param#) ||'%' AND ( a.supplier_no=#factory# OR a.parent_no=#factory#)
SELECT T.SUPPLIER_NO AS code,T.SUPPLIER_NO AS name,'' aogFactory from MM_PUB_USER_SUPPLIER T WHERE T.supplier_no LIKE UPPER(#param#) ||'%' AND USER_NAME = #factory#
SELECT T.SUPPLIER_NO AS code,T.SUPPLIER_NO AS name,'' aogFactory from MM_PUB_USER_SUPPLIER T WHERE USER_NAME = #factory#
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'JIT_ARR_DEPOT'
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'JIT_ERP_ARR_DEPOT'
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'ORDER_TYPE'
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'WORKCENTER_TYPE'
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'JIT_PACKAGE_TYPE'
SELECT T.Kb_Code AS CODE, T.KB_NAME AS name FROM MM_JIT_KB T WHERE T.FACTORY = #value# ORDER BY T.KB_CODE
SELECT MPDD.CODE_VALUE AS code, MPDD.CODE_VALUE_NAME AS name FROM MM_PUB_DATA_DICT MPDD WHERE MPDD.CODE_TYPE = 'JIT_IS_LTP'
SELECT DISTINCT SUPPLIER_NO AS code, SUPPLIER_NO AS name FROM MM_SUPPLIER ORDER BY SUPPLIER_NO
SELECT COMPANY_NO AS code, COMPANY_NO AS name FROM MM_PUB_LOGISTICS_COMPANY WHERE TYPE = '3'
SELECT COMPANY_NO AS code, COMPANY_NO AS name FROM MM_PUB_LOGISTICS_COMPANY WHERE TYPE = '4'
select GROUP_CODE as code, GROUP_NAME as name from MM_PUB_MSG_GROUP ORDER BY GROUP_CODE
